flavor_text_entries.gold:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Its body is so
light, it must
grip the ground firmly with its
feet to keep from
being blown away.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
It can be carried
away on even the
gentlest breeze. It may even float
all the way to the
next town.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
This POKéMON drifts and floats with the
wind. If it senses the approach of
strong winds, HOPPIP links its leaves with other HOPPIP to prepare against
being blown away.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
This POKéMON drifts and floats with the
wind. If it senses the approach of
strong winds, HOPPIP links its leaves with other HOPPIP to prepare against
being blown away.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
This POKéMON drifts and floats with the
wind. If it senses the approach of strong
winds, a HOPPIP links leaves with others
to prepare against being blown away.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Its body is so light, it must grip the
ground firmly with its feet to keep from
being blown away.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
To keep from being blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They do
enjoy gentle breezes, though.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It drifts on winds. It is said that
when HOPPIP gather in fields and
mountains, spring is on the way.
